organization.content:

1. Indianapolis
2. Kansas City
3. Cincinnati

2. Kansas City is a city, but it is also the name of a sports team, the Kansas City Chiefs, who play in the National Football League (NFL). Therefore, it can be considered an organization.
3. Cincinnati is a city, but it is also the name of a sports team, the Cincinnati Bengals, who play in the National Football League (NFL). Therefore, it can be considered an organization.
